name: Call-To-Action Bar
author: JadeMind

sections.description:
This plugin adds a simple bar at the top of each of your wordpress pages with a nice call-to-action button. It can be used to promote your products or display some important news for your visitors. You can customize all background and text colors of the bar to your own desires.

Major features are:

  • Simple and clean bar at top of your page.
  • The bar sticks to the top of your page while scrolling.
  • Customize bar background and text color.
  • Customize call-to-action background and text color.
sections.installation:
Upload the Call-To-Action Bar plugin to your blog, activate it and configure your preferred settings.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed admin css styles.
  • Added option to dismiss the bar.

1.0.0

  • Initial release of the plugin.
